text: Equipped with the sports facilities of a stadium track (parallel bars, etc. ) and with the tranquility of a pristine forest, this is hands down one of the best parks in the kovan estate. It directly links some of the major estate roads and features a playground for your children. With zero elevation in all directions, it is a good place to take an evening stroll or do some light exercise along the way home.

Full of screaming children running all over the fitness corner. Some children got no parents teach, throw mud all over the benches. Worse are those Dimensions students occupying up large amounts of space. All in all, a very crowded ridiculous park.

Nested inside Kovan, Richards estate. It's a small park with limited parking. It has a small exercise corner, playground and an area with hoops. It's a great neighborhood playground for young and old.
My 1.5-2 yo had some good fun running around here. Good games: slides, climb, swing, etc.
